scripts.docker:run:deps: docker compose up -d redis db storage
scripts.clean: rm -r node_modules && rm -r common/node_modules && rm -r server/node_modules && rm -r web/node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:maint && npm run build:common && concurrently "npm run build:server" "npm run build:web"
scripts.build-dev: npm run build:maint && npm run build-dev:common && concurrently "npm run build:server" "npm run build-dev:web"
scripts.build:compressed-size: npm run build:common && npm run build:web
scripts.build-dev:web: cd web && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.build-dev:common: cd common && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.build:web: cd web && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:common: cd common && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:maint: cd maintenance && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run build:common && concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "CO,BE,FE" -c "bgYellow.bold,bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgCyan.bold" "cd common && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run start" "cd web && npm run dev"
scripts.start-common: npm run build:common && cd common && npm run dev
scripts.start-backend: npm run build:server && cd server && npm run start
scripts.start-frontend: npm run build:web && cd web && npm run dev
scripts.test: npm run build:common && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd web && npm run test" "cd server && SERVER_CONFIG_PATH='../config.json' npm run test"
